video.title: Dinosaur Train
video.synopsis: A preschool-aged T-Rex and his adoptive family go for adventures on the Dinosaur Train and learn fascinating new facts about incredible creatures.

episodes.synopsis: The Pteranodons are traveling to a big Theropod Club Convention. / The Pteranodon family continues the journey to Laramidia, the big city!
episodes.title: Dinosaur Big City: Pt. 1 / Dinosaur Big City: Pt. 2

episodes.synopsis: The Dinosaur Train arrives in a dinosaur metropolis. / Buddy and Tiny help King Cryolophosaurus overcome his fear of performing for a big crowd.
episodes.title: Dinosaur Big City: Pt. 3 / Dinosaur Big City: Pt. 4

episodes.synopsis: The family meets a "cousin" of the Conductor's who knows more about the stars than anyone. / The kids build their own version of a nest on the beach.
episodes.title: Stargazing on the Night Train / Get Into Nature!

episodes.synopsis: The Nature Trackers meet the Sanajeh, a huge Cretaceous snake from what is now India. / The Conductor teaches the kids about nature's life cycle.
episodes.title: Shiny and Snakes / Tiny Loves Flowers

episodes.synopsis: Buddy, an adopted T-Rex, wishes he knew more about his ancestors, so Dad takes him to visit a Raptorex. / The kids are cooped up in the nest.
episodes.title: Buddy Explores the Tyrannosaurs / Rainy Day Fight

episodes.synopsis: Keenan Chirostemotes claims the Pteranodon sibs can't compete in a contest because they aren't dinosaurs. / The Conductor tells how to plant flowers.
episodes.title: That's Not a Dinosaur / Tiny's Garden

episodes.synopsis: Penelope Protoceratops lives in a part of the world that gets a lot of earthquakes. / A new car on the train has dozens of eggs in little nests.
episodes.title: The Earthquake / Nursery Car

episodes.synopsis: Buddy and Tiny meet a bird who has been displaced by the recent forest fires. / The family visits an area that was ravaged by a forest fire.
episodes.title: The Lost Bird / The Forest Fire

episodes.synopsis: The weather has been dry for weeks, and all the water holes are disappearing. / Dad is competing in the annual fishing contest at the Big Misty Sea.
episodes.title: Dry Times at Pteranodon Terrace / Big Misty Sea Fishing Contest

episodes.synopsis: It finally rains again, but the storm grows into a hurricane! / After the hurricane, two refugees wash up from across the Western Interior Sea.
episodes.title: Hurricane at Pteranodon Terrace / Rafting the Cretaceous

episodes.synopsis: The kids meet a strange nocturnal mammal named Vlad Volaticotherium. / The Pteranodons learn more about their neighbors, the Lambeosaurus family.
episodes.title: Haunted Roundhouse / Big Pond Pumpkin Patch

episodes.synopsis: Don declares that it's his "winter wish" to see snow fall again. / The Conductor suggests that the family stop to see the Aurora Borealis.
episodes.title: Don's Winter Wish / Festival of Lights

episodes.synopsis: The Elasmosaurus family is going away to follow their food, the fish. / King Cryolophosaurus hears a wonderful singer at a music festival.
episodes.title: Dinosaur Train Submarine: Otto Opthalmosaurus / King Meets Crystal

episodes.synopsis: The gang meets a shonosaurus, something between a dolphin and a whale. / Buddy and Tiny befriend a sauroposeidon who's been adopted by microraptors.
episodes.title: Dinosaur Train Submarine: Shoshana Shonosaurus / All Kinds of Families

episodes.synopsis: Tiny wants to gather the dinosaurs in the "A to Z" song for a picnic. / The train continues traveling around the Mesozoic, picking up more dinosaurs.
episodes.title: Dinos A to Z: Pt. 1: The Big Idea / Dinos A to Z: Pt. 2: Spread the Word

episodes.synopsis: The Pteranodon family reunites with dinosaurs they've met before, and are introduced to other species. / The Dinosaur Train is now very crowded!
episodes.title: Dinos A to Z, Pt. 3: Classification / Dinos A to Z: Pt. 4: A to Z Picnic

episodes.synopsis: The Pteranodon kids meet Allie Alamosaurus, an enormous, plant-eating sauropod. / Dad takes the Pteranodon kids on an overnight camping trip.
episodes.title: Remember the Alamosaurus / Sunrise, Sunset

episodes.synopsis: The Pteranodons meet Denise Diplodocus, a super long, super big dinosaur. / Shiny is nervous about Gilbert's impending visit to Pteranodon Terrace.
episodes.title: A Heck of a Neck / Gilbert Visits the Nest

episodes.synopsis: The kids visit the Jurassic time period to meet adventurous Apollo Apatosaurus. / Mrs. Pteranodon cleans out the clutter from the family nest.
episodes.title: An Apatosaurus Adventure / Nature Art

episodes.synopsis: The kids' sauropod friend is now too big to ride on the Dinosaur Train! / Mr. Pteranodon and Mr. Lambeosaurus take the kids to see a field of geysers.
episodes.title: Arnie Rides the Flatcar / Old Reliable

episodes.synopsis: Team Pteranodon travels to a swamp to meet a 40-foot crocodile. / The kids delight in realizing they share traits with their grandparents.
episodes.title: Tiny and the Crocodile / Meet the Grandparents

episodes.synopsis: Buddy and Don stumble upon a mystery when they find unhatched eggs on the beach. / The kids have fun spending a day with their grandparents.
episodes.title: The Egg Stealer? / To the Grandparents' Nest We Go!

episodes.synopsis: Buddy and Tiny meet Dylan and Devlin Dilophosaurus, twins with double-crests on their heads. / The Pteranodons watch a meteor shower in the sky!
episodes.title: Double-Crested Trouble / Erma and the Conductor

episodes.synopsis: The kids meet Patrick and Pamela Pachycephalosaurus, two dinosaurs with enormous dome heads. / Don is missing a rare item in his collection: amber.
episodes.title: Dome-Headed Dinosaur / Treasure Hunt

episodes.synopsis: The Pteranodons meet fast swimmers Maisie and Marvin Mosasaurus. / Mr. and Mrs. Pteranodon are going on a date, leaving the kids with a babysitter.
episodes.title: Dinosaur Train Submarine: Maisie Mosasaurus / Date Night

episodes.synopsis: The Pteranodons are on the beach watching eggs hatch. / Tiny and Buddy find out a newer train will be riding the same tracks as the Dinosaur Train.
episodes.title: Dinosaur Train Submarine: A Sea Turtle Tale / Rocket Train
